def transform(sequence):
    last_zero_index = sequence.rindex("0")
    max_digit = max(sequence)
    transformed_sequence = sequence[:last_zero_index] + ''.join(max_digit if x == '0' else x for x in sequence)
    return transformed_sequence

def transform(sequence):
    last_zero_index = sequence.rindex("0")
    max_digit = max(sequence)
    transformed_sequence = sequence[:last_zero_index] + ''.join(max_digit if x == '0' else x for x in sequence)
    return transformed_sequence
